Question
========
Sort the answers to proposition 2 (variable: proposition2) in descending order (from high to low) and the grades on the introductory sociology exam (variable: introduction_sociology) in ascending order (from low to high). Write the grade on the mathematics exam (variable: mathematics) of the 50th person in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

n.b. If in your file the variable names are in the first row, you need the 51st row.

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-206-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-206-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 5,537.
